example.name: just transitive
example.text: Partisans of the two combatants sat side by side in the 49,000-plus seats of Oakland Coliseum, and while they cheered their favorites and booed the opposition, hostilities advanced no further, at least as far as I could see.

example.name: with cause
example.text: [John]-1 was booed *trace*-1 for playing to the peanut gallery.
example.arg: for playing to the peanut gallery

predicate.note: Frames file for 'boo' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Judgement.
